item.title: Interactive 3D plot
item.description: Interactive 3D plot created using plotly: library(plotly) mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 0)] <- 'Automatic' mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 1)] <- 'Manual' mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am) p <- plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~hp, z = ~qsec, color = ~am, colors = c('#BF382A', '#0C4B8E')) %>% add_markers() %>% layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Weight'), yaxis = list(title = 'Gross horsepower'), zaxis = list(title = '1/4 mile time'))) p {"
